timeline.bodyText: @percyashu couldn't this just be removed, instead of made package local?
timeline.author: vorburger

replies.bodyText: I look at these and JPA requires entities to have a no-args constructo .
replies.author: percyashu

timeline.bodyText: I was quite surprised that you were able to remove this - how come? Is RestAssured's default 8443? Isn't it better to keep this explicit?
timeline.author: vorburger

replies.bodyText:
RestAssured.port is a static field  hence picked up by StaticAssignmentInConstructor check.
I removed  that line because Utils.initializeRESTAssured() sets the port to 8443.
I could try creating a method in Utils to initialize RestAssured with specific port or just revert this leave the check disabled.
replies.author: percyashu

replies.bodyText: Does this makes it more explicit
replies.author: percyashu
